item.title: Report E-2024120308
item.description:
Report E-2024120308

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-20
  • City: LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1211ET, XPO-UVG notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 2 quarts of 130 gm acetone reducer Axalta was released from a metal pail due to a forklift accident. The release impacted the concrete dock. XPO informed us that this was already cleaned up and placed into a 55-gallon metal drum which contacts product, oil dri, cardboard and gloves.
